description: Collect 10 stamps and get 1 free coffee!

backFields.label: How to earn stamps
backFields.value: Get 1 stamp for every regular sized coffee purchased.

backFields.label: Reward details
backFields.value: Get a free large sized coffee of your choice after collecting all stamps.

backFields.attributedValue: Visit our website Follow us on Facebook Directions to Abba Java https://www.google.com/maps?saddr=My+Location&daddr=+15+Queen's+Road+Central,+Central

backFields.attributedValue: 1. Get 1 stamp for every regular sized coffee purchased. 2. Collect 10 stamps to receive any free large coffee upon your next visit. 3. This card, stamps, and rewards are valid for 2 months after your sign up date. 4. Stamps and rewards cannot be exchanged, refunded, replaced or redeemed for cash. 5. Abba Java reserve the right of final decisions in case of any disputes. NOTE: This digital stamp card has no real value other than demonstrating how digital stamp cards work. This card is an example of how a business can use digital stamp cards to replace paper ones. Any resemblance to actual brand or business is purely coincidental. If you want to issue digital stamp cards like this to your customers, visit loopyloyalty.com Visit Loopy Loyalty.
